summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account from September 1, 2018, to September 30, 2018. It includes information on debits, credits, and ending balances, as well as instructions for reporting errors in transactions.

persons.name: Steuart OkIfiekl
persons.context: Steuart OkIfiekl is mentioned as the account holder for the Deutsche Bank account detailed in the document.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is listed as a contact associated with the account, indicating a legal representation role.

keyFacts: The document details account transactions for the month of September 2018.
Steuart OkIfiekl is the account holder for the Deutsche Bank account.
Darren K. Indyke is associated with the account as an attorney.
The account had a beginning balance of $241,431.86 and an ending balance of $184,512.01.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made during the month, including payroll fees and health premiums.
